contest-event.event-date:
April 7, 1968 D Yorkshire Brass Band Championship (Championship Section)
Yorkshire Brass Band Championship (Championship Section) 0 Test Piece Contest Yorkshire Brass Band Championship yorkshire-brass-band-championship-champi-4123
None Yorkshire
Championship
Tournament for Brass
St. George's Hall, Bradford, West Yorkshire, England, UK Only 2 bands attended, and as a result both bands agreed to play an overture and a chorus. Yorkshire Imps played Judex (95) and Ruy Blas (92) giving a total of 377 points. Bradford played The Explorers (87) and Hallelujah (94) giving a total of 366 points. Percussion was allowed to play. Info - British Bandsman April 27 1968.
Feb. 18, 2017, 7:40 a.m. Feb. 18, 2017, 7:49 a.m.
1 Yorkshire Imperial Brass Band Trevor Walmsley
2 Bradford Victoria Tom Atkinson
